metadata.title: CVE-2019-16088 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Xpdf 3.04 has a SIGSEGV in XRef::fetch in XRef.cc after many recursive calls to Catalog::countPageTree in Catalog.cc.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> doesn't look like the affected code is in poppler

criterions.comment: ipe package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
